page.title: 11INDUSTRY IN SPOONER ROAD
page.content: A group of six children went to Folliards Hydraulics factory in Spooner Row. The factory is situated near the railway station and makes hydraulics for machines. The factory has been here for 15 months, before that it was in Wymondham. It employs 13 people. The owner showed us round the factory. First of all we went into the drawing office where they take the orders, then someone has to draw what is needed. Then a list of parts is made and they are obtained from the stores. If a certain part is not available then it is sometimes made in the factory. One machine in the factory has to be restored as it is very old and the owner would like to replace it. The people in the factory work from 7.30am - 5.30pm.
